/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the scene. The street, bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, with their traditional Chinese architectural style, add a touch of historical charm to the scene. The trees, standing tall and proud, provide a refreshing contrast to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the distance, casting long shadows and bathing everything in a warm, golden light. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and architecture, capturing the essence of Beijing's cityscape.
